name: One dimension chess
description:
DISCLAIMER I have small amount of free time so dont expect a lot from this game. It was made just for rofl ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

So this game was made for unexpected game jam. This was my first game jam, but i had but I had little free time to make a game, so i made this simple and meaningless game, but if for some reason you want to support me, you can do it here https://www.donationalerts.com/r/limofeus

chess icons from https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:SVG_chess_pieces
Sound effect obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Also this game was made with only two scripts...
